title: David and Jay's Touring Toolshed
overview: Sir David Jason and Jay Blades MBE are hitting the road in their Touring Toolshed to help members of the public, professional makers, and enthusiasts take their crafts to the next level.In the programme, David and Jay park up their toolshed at the UK's air shows, steam rallies, county fairs and vintage festivals, to meet some of the UK's most talented crafters, makers and tinkerers â€“ as well as people who could use a little help!
